item.title: New Vogue U.S. Head of Editorial Chloe Malle Is a “Proud Nepo Baby”
item.description: Malle’s parents, actress Candice Bergen and director/screenwriter Louis Malle, are both Oscar nominees.

item.title: Anna Wintour Taps Chloe Malle as Vogue U.S. Head of Editorial
